detail_desc: Knee-length dress in a crinkled cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated trim at the back. Embroidery and a decorative bow with tassels at the top, and a hemstitched seam at the top and hem. Lined.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum movement with embroidery and hard-worn details. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.

detail_desc: One-button satin tuxedo jacket in a cotton blend with a sheen. Shawl collar, chest pocket, jetted front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist, which combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
